attributes.action: Knighthood for Nick Knowles from DIY SOS.
attributes.additional_details:
Nick Knowles has committed his working career to helping others in need, whether this be animals, children, disabled, disadvantaged or his work with injured UK servicemen. His work includes Mission Africa, Saving Planet Earth and of course he magnificent work on DIY SOS helping all kinds of disadvantaged people in the UK. This has also spawned other self-help organisations helping even more people.

He also presented "Invictus - The Road To The Games", helping our injured servicemen.
attributes.background:
I call on the UK Government, Members of Parliament and the general public to support a Knighthood for Nick Knowles from DIY SOS amongst other programmes.

The work he has done for the disabled, disadvantaged and injured servicemen deserves an award for his commitment to the betterment of the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
